The Sebi Adjudicating Officer held that the appellant and other Directors were found guilty for the violation of the provisions of the Act and Regulations 2003. Markets regulator, Sebi, has issued a notice to the former chairman and managing director of Narayanan Group, N Narayanan, asking him to appear before it to explain why he should not be banned from acting as a company director.
